comment.author: 76204898@N00
comment._content: William, Prince of Hohenzollern (German: Wilhelm August Karl Joseph Peter Ferdinand Benedikt Fürst von Hohenzollern) (7 March 1864, Schloss Benrath, near Düsseldorf - 22 October 1927, Sigmaringen) was the eldest son of Leopold, Prince of Hohenzollern and Infanta Antónia of Portugal. His maternal grandparents were Maria II of Portugal and her King consort Ferdinand II of Portugal. On 20 January 1915 he married Adelgunde of Bavaria in Munich. Her picture is here: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/5739972861/in/photostream]

comment.author: 34911459@N08
comment._content: trialsanderrors: thanks for the additional information.  We'll update the record to include this information.

comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: Another photo of the Prince and his second wife in the Bain Collection, taken after their January, 1915 wedding. The photo of Adelgunde above is from 1904.
